feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.45.0
entry.content:
üö®If you use the connect method in the embed sdk, please check the docs.

‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: enable api key access for global connections endpoints (#6919) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: open new window for embed connection (#6929) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • fix(respaid): added is_agency_collection property to create_new_campaign (#6917) @mariiawidrpay
  • fix: changed fields for create_new_campaign action (#6906) @mariiawidrpay
  • feat(cloutly): send review invite action (#6900) @joshuaheslin
  • fix: new stop actions field invoice_number (#6901) @mariiawidrpay
  • fix(github): fix sdk import (#6897) @kishanprmr
  • fix(google-sheets): fix default sheet dropdown error (#6884) @kishanprmr
  • feat(intercom): new 8 triggers and fixes trigger test response (#6855) @kishanprmr
  • feat(confluence): create page from template action (#6857) @kishanprmr
  • fix(perplexity-ai): Remove deprecated models (#6865) @kishanprmr
  • fix(slack): fix new message trigger test data order (#6888) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: jira cloud fetching all pages of projects (#6893) @hazemadelkhalel

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: enhance router output for test step (#6916) @hazemadelkhalel

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: update nx (#6935) @abuaboud
  • fix: add missing alt attribute to the img tag (#6904) @s31w4n
  • revert: linting before push (#6894) @hazemadelkhalel
  • refactor: Security upgrade octokit from 3.2.1 to 4.1.2 (#6877) @abuaboud
  • fix: changed base url to prod. Made 'amount' field optional (#6934) @mariiawidrpay
  • fix: test branches with new output (#6932) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: connection created event for sdk was always resolved to undefined (#6924) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: make rename flow dialog default to the current flow name (#6898) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @MariaShyn, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @joshuaheslin, @kishanprmr, @mariiawidrpay and @s31w4n

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.45.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(embed-sdk): whether the external Id passed to the connect method is used or not, third-party users will be able to connect their accounts (#6942) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: fix polling trigger syntax (#6931) @kishanprmr

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @amrabuaza and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: show input data for testing a step (#6930) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add respond piece framework and return response action (#6977) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(array-input): Added inline items (#6094) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • feat(slack): add usergroups:read Slack permission (#6960) @AdamSelene
  • fix: jira cloud auth error message (#6963) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(devin): create session, get session and send message action (#6948) @ahmad-swanblocks
  • feat(firecrawl): add extract with prompt and schema (#6945) @geekyme-fsmk
  • fix: jira-cloud typos (#6947) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(JIRA): add custom fields for issue action and find user action (#6921) @kishanprmr
  • fix(github): fix github sdk build issue (#6944) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: add body limit again after accidental remove (#6979) @abuaboud
  • fix: query piece larger than 1.0.0 (#6978) @abuaboud
  • fix: added checker to check if new window closed to resolve connect method promise (#6973) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: stop throwing errors when (fetching dropdown data or saving step testing result) if sample data file is not found. (#6975) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @ahmad-swanblocks, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @geekyme-fsmk, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @kylieatalan

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: we should always use importFresh in code executor (#6986) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: missing Write project permission for alert settings & missing alerts in project role dialog (#6985) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(auto-trial-activation): automatically activate a trial key when the platform is deployed on the cloud (#6984) @amrabuaza
  • fix: missing encoding in Content-Disposition header when downloading step files (#6982) @janwytze

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @amrabuaza, @hazemadelkhalel and @janwytze

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.2
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat: add respond to webhook return response action (#6992) @hazemadelkhalel
  • revert: remove respond from webhook piece [breaking change] (#6991) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(linear): set team_id optional on linear issue update trigger (#6980) @ArnaudSpanneut

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: saving SSO providers + show trial license key expiration date (#6994) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: list owners should be only for ee (#7000) @abuaboud
  • fix: get used piecess (#6999) @abuaboud
  • fix: UI error when using AI generated code before ever testing the step. (#6993) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: optimize fetching /options for pieces by using cache (#7001) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: move flows & folders actions requires write folder permission (#6990) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @ArnaudSpanneut, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel and @s31w4n
